biotools.summary: A database of gene-disease pathway association, along with tools to identify i) disease-disease comorbidity, ii) pathway enrichment, iii) disease enrichment, iv) disease enrichment using GO terms, v) polypharmacological target prediction and vi) Venn of genes, pathways, domains, GO terms, and custom list
